Html:
Hi,

  I know the datajs library enables us to use "username/password" to authenticate to an OData provider, but besides this basic authentication mechanism, is there any existing way (or future planned way) to enable SSO or SAML authentication in the datajs library ?

 

Thanks in advance for your time,

Chris

Hi Clarose,

   Hope you are doing great.  We currently don't have any plans for enabling Single Sign On or SAML... however, you can always replace with your custom http client that supports whatever authentication mechanism you need.  Please see our documentation page on networking on the library and the sample on creating a custom http client.

Regards,

Alex Trigo.
